00014 #ifndef ULIB_OBJECTIO_H
00015 #define ULIB_OBJECTIO_H 1
00016 
00017 #include <ulib/base/base.h>
00018 
00019 #ifdef HAVE_STRSTREAM_H
00020 #  include <strstream.h>
00021 #else
00022 #  include <ulib/replace/strstream.h>
00023 #endif
00024 
00025 // gestione conversione oggetti in const char*...
00026 
00027 #ifndef U_BUFSZ_OBJ_IO
00028 #define U_BUFSZ_OBJ_IO (10 * 1024)
00029 #endif
00030 
00031 class UStringRep;
00032 
00033 struct U_EXPORT UObjectIO {
00034 
00035         static ostrstream* os;
00036         static istrstream* is;
00037 
00038         static bool        busy_output;
00039         static char        buffer_output[U_BUFSZ_OBJ_IO];
00040         static uint32_t    buffer_output_len;
00041 
00042         static void init();
00043         static void output();
00044         static void input(char* t, uint32_t tlen);
00045 
00046         static UStringRep* create();
00047 };
00048 
00049 template <class T> inline void UString2Object(char* t, uint32_t tlen, T& object)
00050 {
00051         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("UString2Object(%s,%u,%p)", t, tlen, &object)
00052 
00053         UObjectIO::input(t, tlen);
00054 
00055         *UObjectIO::is >> object;
00056 }
00057 
00058 template <class T> inline char* UObject2String(T& object)
00059 {
00060         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("UObject2String(%p)", &object)
00061 
00062         if (!UObjectIO::os) UObjectIO::init();
00063 
00064         *UObjectIO::os << object;
00065 
00066         UObjectIO::output();
00067 
00068         return UObjectIO::buffer_output;
00069 }
00070 
00071 template <class T> inline void* UObject2StringRep(T* object)
00072 {
00073         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("UObject2StringRep(%p)", object)
00074 
00075         if (!UObjectIO::os) UObjectIO::init();
00076 
00077         *UObjectIO::os << *object;
00078 
00079         return UObjectIO::create();
00080 }
00081 
00082 template <class T> inline uint32_t UObject2String(T& object, char* buffer, uint32_t buffer_size)
00083 {
00084         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("UObject2String(%p,%p,%u)", &object, buffer, buffer_size)
00085 
00086         ostrstream _os(buffer, buffer_size);
00087 
00088         _os << object;
00089 
00090         uint32_t len = _os.pcount();
00091 
00092         U_INTERNAL_PRINT("_os.pcount() = %u", len)
00093 
00094         U_INTERNAL_ASSERT_MINOR(len, buffer_size)
00095 
00096         return len;
00097 }
00098 
00099 #ifdef U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE
00100 #undef U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE
00101 #endif
00102 
00103 template <class T> inline char* U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(T& object)
00104 {
00105         U_INTERNAL_TRACE("U_OBJECT_TO_TRACE(%p)", &object)
00106 
00107 #ifdef DEBUG
00108         UTrace::suspend();
00109 #endif
00110 
00111         char* str = UObject2String<T>(object);
00112 
00113         str = strndup(str, UObjectIO::buffer_output_len);
00114 
00115 #ifdef DEBUG
00116         UTrace::resume();
00117 #endif
00118 
00119         return str;
00120 }

00122 #endif
